fa_IR {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%f%N%a%N%d%N%b%N%s %h %e %r%N%%z %T%N%c%N" }
    }
    CountryISBNNumber { "364" }
    CountryNumber { "364" }
    CurrencyElements { 
            "\u0631\u06CC\u0627\u0644",
            "IRR ",
            "\u066B",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Persian locale for Iran" }
        Source { "The FarsiWeb Project" }
        Address { "Computing Center, Sharif University of Technology, Azadi Ave, Tehran, Iran" }
        Contact { "Roozbeh Pournader" }
        Email { "roozbeh@sharif.edu" }
        Telephone { "+98 21 6022378" }
        Fax { "+98 21 6019568" }
        Language { "Persian" }
        Territory { "Iran" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "2.1" }
        Date { "2001-03-18" }
    }
    LanguageLibraryUse { "per" }
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "[yY\u0628f].*" }
        NoExpression { "[nN\u062E\u0646o].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%s%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "\u0622\u0642\u0627\u06CC" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "\u062E\u0627\u0646\u0645" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "\u062E\u0627\u0646\u0645" }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "\u062E\u0627\u0646\u0645" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            "\u066B",
            "\u066C",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "#,##0.# \u00A4;-#,##0.# \u00A4",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "\u202A+%c %a %l\u202C" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "00" }
        InternationalPrefix { "98" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            AmPmMarkers{
                    "\u0635\u0628\u062D",
                    "\u0639\u0635\u0631",
            }
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "\u202Bhh:mm:ss aa\u202C",
                    "HH:mm:ss",
                    "HH:mm:ss",
                    "HH:mm:ss",
                    "yyyy/MMMM/dd",
                    "\u202BEEEE dd MMMM yyyy\u060C hh:mm:ss aa\u202C",
                    "yyyy/MMMM/dd",
                    "yyyy/MMMM/dd",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "\u06CC.",
                            "\u062F.",
                            "\u0633.",
                            "\u0686.",
                            "\u067E.",
                            "\u062C.",
                            "\u0634.",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "\u06CC\u06A9\u200C\u0634\u0646\u0628\u0647",
                            "\u062F\u0648\u0634\u0646\u0628\u0647",
                            "\u0633\u0647\u200C\u0634\u0646\u0628\u0647",
                            "\u0686\u0647\u0627\u0631\u0634\u0646\u0628\u0647",
                            "\u067E\u0646\u062C\u200C\u0634\u0646\u0628\u0647",
                            "\u062C\u0645\u0639\u0647",
                            "\u0634\u0646\u0628\u0647",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "\u0698\u0627\u0646",
                            "\u0641\u0648\u0631",
                            "\u0645\u0627\u0631",
                            "\u0622\u0648\u0631",
                            "\u0645\u0640\u0647",
                            "\u0698\u0648\u0646",
                            "\u0698\u0648\u06CC",
                            "\u0627\u0648\u062A",
                            "\u0633\u067E\u062A",
                            "\u0627\u0643\u062A",
                            "\u0646\u0648\u0627",
                            "\u062F\u0633\u0627",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "\u0698\u0627\u0646\u0648\u06CC\u0647",
                            "\u0641\u0648\u0631\u06CC\u0647",
                            "\u0645\u0627\u0631\u0633",
                            "\u0622\u0648\u0631\u06CC\u0644",
                            "\u0645\u0647",
                            "\u0698\u0648\u0626\u0646",
                            "\u0698\u0648\u0626\u06CC\u0647",
                            "\u0627\u0648\u062A",
                            "\u0633\u067E\u062A\u0627\u0645\u0628\u0631",
                            "\u0627\u0643\u062A\u0628\u0631",
                            "\u0646\u0648\u0627\u0645\u0628\u0631",
                            "\u062F\u0633\u0627\u0645\u0628\u0631",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
